text: Levi phungnga thiampu changna chungnga Israel mi ngaidiang Dan kha aleipeii. Tuun, Levi phungnga thiampu ngai chuonkha pui leitungjei inchu, Aaron dungjuiya ka-emak thiampu Melchizedek mason dungjuiya7:11. Thiampu Melchizedek mason dungjuiya (enru 5:6) thiampu leiilak inkhat arei leiom nunijei.
